Get BEDs associated with BEDset

Source: R/bedbaser.R
bb_beds_in_bedset.Rd

Get BEDs associated with BEDset

bb_beds_in_bedset(api, bedset_id)

Arguments

api

API object of BEDbase created from BEDbase()

bedset_id

integer() BEDset record identifier

Value

list() BED record identifiers

Examples

api <- BEDbase()
#> Warning: incomplete final line found on '/tmp/RtmpJmN7Sc/file91b3880bdc6'
ex_bedset <- bb_example(api, "bedset")
bb_beds_in_bedset(api, ex_bedset$id)
#> # A tibble: 80 × 8
